Headline: #51 51st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 51st/Shields
ShortDescription: Eastbound 51 51st  buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, Halsted, 47th, Wells and 51st: due to, street blockage near 51st/Shields.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #51 51st  buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, Halsted, 47th, Wells and 51st: due to, street blockage near 51st/Shields.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays at Clinton due to a door problem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays at Clinton due to a door problem.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
